spring.name: Spring Festival
spring.description: The clan gathers to celebrate the blooming of flowers. Kits play, apprentices spar, and elders share stories.

quest.name: Festival Preparations
quest.description: Help gather flowers and food for the spring celebration.

spring.name: River Flood
spring.description: Heavy rains cause the river to swell. The clan must secure the nursery and supplies.

quest.name: Flood Defense
quest.description: Move kits and essential supplies to higher ground.

spring.name: First Kits of Spring
spring.description: The first kits of the season are born in the nursery. The clan celebrates new life.

quest.name: Welcome the Kits
quest.description: Assist in caring for the newborn kits.
